subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: Liverpool was paired with Chelsea in the Champions League for the fifth time in five years, while Barcelona was matched against Bayern Munich in another quarterfinal. Defending champion Manchester United will face F.C. Porto and Arsenal plays Villarreal. The first legs will be played April 7-8. champions.
